articles.description: Florida launched a statewide website for getting your place in line for a vaccine Friday. MyVaccine. FL. Gov is the state’s new one stop shop for vaccinations. It allows Floridians to enter their information and secure a place in line for a vaccine. Cap…

articles.author: Andrew  Mertins, FOX 11 News
articles.title: COVID-19 vaccination site to open in Oshkosh starting Monday - Fox11online.com
articles.description: OSHKOSH (WLUK) -- A COVID-19 vaccination site will be opening in Oshkosh Monday, February 1 at the Sunnyview Expo Center. The vaccination site will open at 1:30 pm on Monday. The Winnebago County Health Department released on Saturday that the site will be va…

articles.author: Katelyn Massarelli
articles.title: FDOH in Collier County to offer COVID-19 vaccines in the coming week - NBC2 News
articles.description: All 570 appointments being offered by the Florida Department of Health in Collier County have been filled for the coming week.
articles.content:
COLLIER COUNTY, Fla. – All 570 appointments being offered by the Florida Department of Health in Collier County have been filled for the coming week. 
Appointment scheduling started at 9 a.m. Sunday… [+1921 chars]
